cards.title: Siteimprove
cards.description: Scans entire websites for accessibility issues, providing prioritized fixes and compliance reporting across WCAG standards.

cards.title: Axe DevTools
cards.description: Developer-focused accessibility testing tool that integrates with browser developer tools to find and fix accessibility issues during development.
cards.linkDesc: Explore Axe DevTools' accessibility testing capabilities.

cards.title: Firefox Accessibility Tools
cards.description: Identifies and highlights accessibility issues directly in the browser, helping developers create WCAG-compliant websites
cards.linkDesc: Learn how to use Firefox for accessibility testing.

cards.title: NVDA
cards.description: Free, open source, globally accessible screen reader for the blind and vision impaired.

cards.title: JAWS
cards.description: A popular screen reader that provides speech and Braille output for Windows computers.

cards.title: WebAIM Contrast Checker
cards.description: Evaluates text visibility against WCAG standards, ensuring readability for users with visual impairments.
cards.linkDesc: Check text contrast ratios with WebAIM.
